Home.badge: Built for the Rocket League grind
Home.heroSub: Train smarter. Track progress. Find reliable teammates.
Home.heroNote: No Rocket League API required. Your progress stays yours.
Home.whyTitle: Discord is great for chat. AERIX is built for progress.
Home.pillar1b: Consistency score so you see your discipline
Home.pillar2Desc: No more random free play sessions.
Home.pillar2a: Tiered programs matched to your rank
Home.pillar2b: Curated training packs with video guides
Home.pillar3Desc: Find teammates who actually show up.
Home.pillar3b: Safer and more reliable than Discord LFG
Home.step1Desc: Tell us your rank, playlist, and what you want to improve. Onboarding takes 30 seconds.
Home.step2Desc: Follow your training plan, queue up packs, or jump into matchmaking when you want a duo.
Home.step3Desc: Track streaks, weekly progress, and rank check-ins. The data shows what's working.
Home.plansTitle: Free to grind. Upgrade when you're ready.
Home.packsDesc: Curated drill packs for aerials, shooting, saves, and more. Queue them up and grind with purpose.
Home.updatesDesc: Stay current on patches, meta shifts, and what they mean for your training. Written for players, not patch note robots.
Home.footerCta: Ready for your next rank-up streak?

Pricing.title: Simple pricing, no surprises.
Pricing.subtitle: Free to start training. Upgrade for deeper tools. Cancel anytime.
Pricing.starterNote: See what you practiced, how long, and what's improving — all in one place.
Pricing.whyPayDesc: Free gives you real training tools — streaks, progress, and session notes. Starter and Pro unlock more drills, deeper tracking, and personalized insights so you can see patterns in how you practice. We build for players who want to improve, and every dollar goes back into making AERIX better.
Pricing.priceNote: Prices shown in {currency}. We adjust pricing by region to keep things fair.
